name: Hà Quang Huy
title: Entry Level Data analysis | MLOps | Bachelor of Space Engineering in HCMIU | AI/ML Innovator and Physic Enthusiast
bio: I came from a solid background in Physic, where I studied everything related to space satellites, including Data Analysis, Classical Image Processing and machine learning development. Simultaneously, grew a strong foundation in information technology and general engineering skills. I thrive in dynamic, collaborative environments and am motivated by the opportunity to make a meaningful impact in every project I undertake.
